00030 std::string skipBlank(std::string s) {
00031         std::string::size_type spacesLeading = s.find_first_not_of(" ");
00032         if (spacesLeading != (std::string::size_type) -1)
00033                 s = s.erase(0, spacesLeading);
00034 
00035         return s;
00036 }
00037 
00038 std::vector<double> getDoubleValuesFromString(std::string aCSVParameterString, unsigned int numberOfParameters) {
00039         std::vector<double> paramsAsDouble;
00040         double aNumber;
00041         boost::char_separator<char> sep(", ");
00042         boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> > tokens(aCSVParameterString, sep);
00043         BOOST_FOREACH(std::string t, tokens) {
00044                 try {
00045                         aNumber = boost::lexical_cast<double>( t.data() ); // convert string to double
00046                         paramsAsDouble.push_back( aNumber );
00047                 } catch ( const boost::bad_lexical_cast & ) {
00048                         //unable to convert
00049                         LOG(WARNING) << "Invalid parameter: unable to convert a string into double vector.";
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 
00053         if (numberOfParameters > 0 && numberOfParameters != paramsAsDouble.size()) {
00054                 LOG(WARNING) << "Invalid number of parameters.";
00055         }
00056 
00057         return paramsAsDouble;
00058 }
00059 
00060 std::string getStringFromDoubleValues(std::vector<double> values) {
00061         std::stringstream s;
00062         for (unsigned int i=0; i<values.size(); i++) {
00063                 s << values[i];
00064                 if (i < values.size() - 1)
00065                         s << ",";
00066         }
00067         return s.str();
00068 }

00070 
00071 std::vector<std::string> getNamesFromString(std::string aCSVParameterString, unsigned int numberOfParameters) {
00072         std::vector<std::string> names;
00073         boost::char_separator<char> sep(", ");
00074         boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> > tokens(aCSVParameterString, sep);
00075         BOOST_FOREACH(std::string t, tokens)
00076                 names.push_back(t.data());
00077 
00078         if (numberOfParameters > 0 && numberOfParameters != names.size())
00079                 LOG(WARNING) << "Invalid number of parameters.";
00080 
00081         return names;
00082 }

00095 ParameterSet::ParameterSet(std::string s) {
00096         boost::char_separator<char> sep(";");
00097         boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> > tokens(s, sep);
00098         BOOST_FOREACH(std::string t, tokens) {
00099                 std::string::size_type posAssign = t.find_first_of("=");
00100                 if (posAssign != (std::string::size_type) -1) {
00101                         insert(Parameter(skipBlank(t.substr(0, posAssign)), skipBlank(t.substr(posAssign+1))));
00102                 } else {
00103                         insert(Parameter("", skipBlank(t)));
00104                 };
00105         }
00106 };
00107 
00108 ParameterSet::ParameterSet(std::vector<std::string> sParams) {
00109         for (unsigned int i=0; i<sParams.size(); i++) {
00110                 std::string s = sParams[i];
00111                 std::string::size_type posAssign = s.find_first_of("=");
00112                 if (posAssign != (std::string::size_type) -1) {
00113                         insert(Parameter(skipBlank(s.substr(0, posAssign)), skipBlank(s.substr(posAssign+1))));
00114                 } else {
00115                         insert(Parameter("", skipBlank(s)));
00116                 };
00117         }       
00118 }

00120 ParameterSet::~ParameterSet() {
00121         // release all data entries
00122         for (std::map<std::string, ParameterData*>::iterator it = dataEntries.begin(); it!=dataEntries.end(); it++)
00123                 delete it->second;
00124 };

00126 bool ParameterSet::hasParam(std::string name) const {
00127         return find(name) != end();
00128 }
00129 
00130 bool ParameterSet::hasDouble(std::string name, double& value) const {
00131         const_iterator it = find(name);
00132         if (it == end() || it->second.empty())
00133                 return false;
00134 
00135         try {
00136                 value = boost::lexical_cast<double>(it->second);
00137         } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
00138                 LOG(WARNING) << "Could not parse value as double: " << it->second;
00139                 return false;
00140         }
00141 
00142         return true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 bool ParameterSet::hasInt(std::string name, int& value) const {
00146         const_iterator it = find(name);
00147         if (it == end() || it->second.empty())
00148                 return false;
00149 
00150         try {
00151                 value = boost::lexical_cast<int>(it->second);
00152         } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
00153                 LOG(WARNING) << "Could not parse value as int: " << it->second;
00154                 return false;
00155         }
00156 
00157         return true;
00158 }

00160 bool ParameterSet::hasUnsignedInt(std::string name, unsigned int& value) const {
00161         const_iterator it = find(name);
00162         if (it == end() || it->second.empty())
00163                 return false;
00164 
00165         try {
00166                 value = boost::lexical_cast<unsigned int>(it->second);
00167         } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
00168                 LOG(WARNING) << "Could not parse value as unsigned int: " << it->second;
00169                 return false;
00170         }
00171 
00172         return true;
00173 }

00175 std::string ParameterSet::pack() {
00176         std::stringstream param;
00177         if (hasParam(""))
00178                 param << operator[]("");
00179         for (const_iterator it = begin(); it != end(); it++)
00180                 if (it->first != "" && it->second != "")
00181                         param << "<" << it->first << ">" << it->second << "</" << it->first << ">";
00182                         
00183         return param.str();
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool ParameterSet::unpack(const std::string& param) {
00187 
00188         // use very simple state machine for counting paranthesis
00189         enum { NEW, PAR1, PAR2, PAR3, PAR_END } state = NEW;
00190         int offset = 0;
00191         std::string name = "";
00192         std::string value = "";
00193 
00194         while (offset < param.length() && offset != -1) {
00195                 int next = param.find_first_of("<>/", offset);
00196                 if (next == -1)
00197                         break;
00198                 std::string sub = param.substr(offset, next-offset);
00199                 switch (param[next]) {
00200                         case '<':
00201                                 if (state == NEW) {
00202                                         if (!sub.empty())
00203                                                 insert(Parameter("", sub));
00204                                         state = PAR1;
00205                                 } else if (state == PAR2) {
00206                                         value = sub;
00207                                         state = PAR3;
00208                                 } else {
00209                                         return false;
00210                                 }
00211                                 break;
00212                         case '>':
00213                                 if (state == PAR1) {
00214                                         name = sub;
00215                                         state = PAR2;
00216                                 } else if (state == PAR_END) {
00217                                         state = NEW;
00218                                         insert(Parameter(name, value));
00219                                 } else {
00220                                         return false;
00221                                 }
00222                                 break;
00223                         case '/':
00224                                 if (state == PAR3) {
00225                                         state = PAR_END;
00226                                 }
00227                                 break;
00228                         default: ;
00229                 }
00230                 offset = next+1;
00231         }
00232         // special case that only name is included
00233         if (offset == 0 && param.length() > 0)
00234                 insert(Parameter("", param));
00235 
00236         return true;
00237 }

00239 
00240 void ParameterSet::addData(std::string name, ParameterData* data) {
00241         // delete old entry, if existent
00242         std::map<std::string, ParameterData*>::iterator it = dataEntries.find(name);
00243         if (it != dataEntries.end())
00244                 delete it->second;
00245 
00246         dataEntries.insert(std::pair<std::string, ParameterData*>(name, data));
00247 }
00248 
00249 bool ParameterSet::hasData(std::string name) {
00250         return dataEntries.find(name) != dataEntries.end();
00251 }
00252 
00253 ParameterData* ParameterSet::getData(std::string name) {
00254         std::map<std::string, ParameterData*>::iterator it = dataEntries.find(name);
00255         if (it != dataEntries.end())
00256                 return it->second;
00257 
00258         return 0;
00259 }

00261 ParameterSet& operator<<(ParameterSet& pl, Parameter param) {
00262         pl.insert(param);
00263         return pl;
00264 }
